Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~scottz If this test simply joins a peer to a channel, it will catchup to block height as normal and pull private data as blocks are committed. It will not exercise reconciliation unless its org was added to a collection at some block height. Is that the case?Â If so, this test could be used for catchup and reconciliation (no need for separate FAB-17362).

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: As part of backlog grooming closing issue as stale. Issue can be reopened in the future.
